metadata.title: TeggiTech — Digital Agency | Dakar, Senegal
metadata.description: We craft digital experiences. Mobile apps, web platforms, and government solutions built in West Africa for the world.

hero.label: Engineering Excellence / Dakar
hero.description: A premium design and development studio bridging the gap between hardware complexity and user-centric software. From West Africa to the world, we build for

offers.label: Our expertise
offers.title: our offers
offers.headline: We support you end-to-end
offers.description: Three pillars to turn your digital ambitions into technical reality.
offers.approach: Our approach is built on agile practices and a permanent critical eye. Both doers and thinkers, we guide your transformations from strategy to production.

conseil.title: consulting
conseil.description: We analyze your needs, audit existing systems, and define the optimal technical architecture. We guide you through technology choices and best practices.

strategie.title: strategy
strategie.description: We define your digital product roadmap, prioritize features, plan sprints, and design your go-to-market. From MVP to scale.

delivery.title: delivery
delivery.description: We build. Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS & Android with React Native, web platforms with Next.js, APIs and integrations. End-to-end development with quality assurance.

expertises.label: Our expertise
expertises.title: our expertise
expertises.description: Two complementary skill sets to design and deliver exceptional digital products.

product.title: Product & Design
product.description: We design user experiences that combine aesthetics and functionality. From user research to design systems, we create interfaces that convert and retain.

engineering.title: Software Engineering
engineering.description: We architect and develop robust, scalable systems. Clean code, optimal performance, and continuous deployment for products that handle the load.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: Archives
projects.description: Selected projects that showcase our commitment to technical precision and aesthetic clarity.

footer.tagline: Designed in Dakar / Built for the world
